attributes.action: Change the bounce back loan turnover from 25% to 50%
attributes.additional_details: However going into a second lock down is going to be very challenging.The second lock down has left a lot of uncertainty for businesses, as the government have stated that there is a potential of the lockdown being extended. This will lead to a lot of small and medium sized businesses will close.
attributes.background: I would like the government to change the criteria for the bounce back loan, as I have spoke to a lot of people and they underestimated their annual turnover due to the uncertainty from this pandemic. Business has picked up for a lot of people in the last few months.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Raise the maximum turnover percentage offered under Bounce Back Loan top ups
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558517
